# [Interview #575: TOM Signing Report - Ted Herman, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=575#2)

#### Question

Was Verin in
*Towers of Midnight*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I know what you're looking for, is Nakomi really Verin, and that's going to be a RAFO.
